[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@vue-storefront/magento-api](./magento-api.md) &gt; [ProductFilterInput](./magento-api.productfilterinput.md)

## ProductFilterInput interface

ProductFilterInput is deprecated, use  instead. ProductFilterInput defines the filters to be used in the search. A filter contains at least one attribute, a comparison operator, and the value that is being searched for.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductFilterInput 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
